_header: Sother the holy pope in Champagne was I-bore
Subjects: Sother, pope, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Sother the Pope

Bod779.First Lines:
Sother þe holy pope in chaumpayne was I boreof þe beste
                    men of þe londe ic woot he nom his more…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…þat he vs ȝeue grace here on erþe so dooure
                    soulus fram sinne sauen & after come þe to
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 400-1.
